Class FactBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • FactBase

  • public class FactBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Facts Base FB, as a list of valid predicates (facts). Also includes a list of all terms present in the facts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FactBase(FactBase fb)
      Constructor by copy for a facts base
      FactBase(java.lang.String s)
      Constructor for a facts base

      Checks whether the facts base contains a given list of atom (in no particular order)

      Tells us whether the facts base contains a certain term or not
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Term>>> getFacts()
      Returns a list of facts (atoms with only constants)

      Returns the number of facts
      java.util.ArrayList<Term> getTerms()

        Returns:
